title: A Guide to Survivorhood
description: A Guide to Your Personal Journey of Healing and Hope by Namid, Author of To Dance Amongst the Stars. This workbook will help guide survivors and the people who love them through the often difficult journey to regain empowerment and self-esteem after sexual assault. Loaded with guided exercises, examples, and discussions, the workbook gives the survivor the tools to rebuild a happy, whole and healthy self. Created and organized by Namid, Founder of The R.A.P.E. Foundation, promoting Recovery, Assistance, Prevention, and Education for survivors of rape, incest, sexual abuse, psychological abuse, and more;
author: Namid
